Class Tournament

java.lang.Object
Models.Tournament

public class Tournament extends Object implements Serializable
Implements the tournament mode in the gameplay

    • getD_gameStateList

      public List<GameState> getD_gameStateList()

      Returns:

    • parseTournamentCommand

      public boolean parseTournamentCommand(GameState p_gameState, String p_operation, String p_argument, GameEngine p_gameEngine) throws Exception
      Parses a tournament command into a tournament object, considering the current state of the game, the given operation, the argument values provided in the command, and the game engine.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - The current state of the game.
      p_operation - The operation specified in the command.
      p_argument - The argument values provided in the command.
      p_gameEngine - The game engine responsible for managing the tournament.
      Returns:
      True if parsing is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown if the map given in the command is invalid.

    • requiredTournamentArgPresent

      public boolean requiredTournamentArgPresent(List<Map<String,String>> p_operations_list, Command p_command)
      Validates a tournament command and checks if the required information is present in the command.
      Parameters:
      p_operations_list - List of operations given in the command.
      p_command - The tournament command.
      Returns:
      True if the command is valid, false otherwise.
